item.title: Poetry and Azure DevOps
item.description: categories: Python Azure Devops date: “2021-02-07” description: How to use Poetry with Azure DevOps slug: python_poetry_with_azure_devops tags: python poetry azure devops title: Poetry and Azure DevOps private package repository Recently I have switched from Pip to Poetry. I use Poetry for both dependency-management and packaging. How to setup Poetry with a private Azure repository ? Microsoft instructions to connect to a private package feed: python -m pip install --upgrade pip pip install keyring artifacts-keyring
